snippet.title: A who's who of people Trump has fired, including Comey and the Mooch
snippet.content: With former White House communications director Anthony Scaramucci after just 10 days in the job, Twitter is ablaze with . It's like The Apprentice never ended. It's like . The only way up (or down) from here is for Trump to , giving us the ultimate Nicolas Cage-themed meme the internet wants and deserves. So how many people has Trump fired now? Who has decided to just fall on their sword? How long did they all last for? And what did those poor souls do to deserve such a fate?
